ticket.title: env['rack.session'] is empty in metal requests when using cookie store
ticket.original-body:
Using CookieStore env['rack.session'] should include session data in metal requests but it's an empty hash.
To reproduce set a session var somewhere in a controller and then add a metal object to print env['rack.session']. It's an empty hash but it should contain the session data.
I've included a rails app that demonstrates the problem. Just start the server, hit http://localhost:3000/toggle and then http://localhost:3000/test Watch the output in the console, env['rack.session'] is empty.
